subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jadson scored from about 12 yards in the seventh minute of overtime in Istanbul, and Shakhtar Donetsk of the Ukraine beat Germany’s Werder Bremen, 2-1, to win the final UEFA Cup. The tournament, Europe’s second most important club competition behind the Champions League, is being renamed the Europa League.
